PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryColumnShoe
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Shape properties common to column shoes.

PropertyDef.Name: ColumnShoeBasePlateThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the column shoe base plate.

PropertyDef.Name: ColumnShoeBasePlateWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The width of the column shoe base plate.

PropertyDef.Name: ColumnShoeBasePlateDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: The depth of the column shoe base plate.

PropertyDef.Name: ColumnShoeCasingHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The height of the column shoe casing.

PropertyDef.Name: ColumnShoeCasingWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The width of the column shoe casing.

PropertyDef.Name: ColumnShoeCasingDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: The depth of the column shoe casing.
